parametrized_description: A woodshop can purchase NumSawTypes different types of saws. Each saw type can cut PlanksCutPerSaw planks of wood per day and produce SawdustPerSaw units of sawdust per day. The woodshop must cut at least MinPlanks planks of wood per day and produce at most MaxSawdust units of sawdust per day. The goal is to determine the number of each type of saw to purchase to minimize the total number of saws needed.

NumSawTypes.description: Number of types of saws available

PlanksCutPerSaw.description: Number of planks cut per day by each saw type

SawdustPerSaw.description: Units of sawdust produced per day by each saw type

MinPlanks.description: Minimum number of planks to be cut per day

MaxSawdust.description: Maximum units of sawdust to be produced per day

NumberOfSaws.description: The number of saws of each type used per day

constraints.description: The woodshop must cut at least MinPlanks planks of wood per day.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(NumberOfSaws[j] * PlanksCutPerSaw[j] for j in range(NumSawTypes)) >= MinPlanks)

constraints.description: The woodshop must produce at most MaxSawdust units of sawdust per day.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(NumberOfSaws[i] * SawdustPerSaw[i] for i in range(NumSawTypes)) <= MaxSawdust)

objective.description: Minimize the total number of saws purchased.
